Third-Party Licenses

Android-Support-Preference-V7-Fix
Android-Support-Preference-V7-Fix comes from https://github.com/Gericop/Android-Support-Preference-V7-Fix, with a mixture of Apache and public domain license.
ThreeTen Android Backport
ThreeTen Android Backport is available from https://github.com/JakeWharton/ThreeTenABP, under ApacheLicense, Version 2.0. It\'s based on http://www.threeten.org/threetenbp/ with BSD 3-clause License.
Material Drawer, Fast Adapter
Mike Penz created the Material Drawer and Fast Adapter libraries, available via https://github.com/mikepenz/MaterialDrawer and https://github.com/mikepenz/FastAdapter under Apache License, Version 2.0.
Sticky Headers Recyclerview
We use the Sticky Headers Recyclerview library from https://github.com/timehop/sticky-headers-recyclerview under Apache License, Version 2.0.
Better Pickers
The Better Pickers library is available from https://github.com/derekbrameyer/android-betterpickers under Apache License, Version 2.0.
Nine Old Androids
Better Pickers also uses Nine Old Androids, available from https://github.com/JakeWharton/NineOldAndroids under Apache License, Version 2.0 too.
Google Play Services
For the Google Play Services, see http://developer.android.com/google/play-services/index.htm. License.
Android Support Libraries
For the Android Support Libraries, see http://developer.android.com/tools/support-library/index.html. The support libraries are licensed under Apache License, Version 2.0
Material Design Icons
See https://github.com/google/material-design-icons. The icon set is licensed under CC-BY 4.0.
Unsplash.com
Some of the toolbar images are from unsplash.com. Unsplash.com publishes high-res photos under CC0 license, see https://unsplash.com/license.
